Package com.xlpoolsion.client.view.screens

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConnectScreen
    Screen shown when the player is typing the ip to connect
    ControlsScreen
    The screen showed when the main gameplay is on going, used to control the player
    LoseScreen
    The screen shown after losing
    LostConnectionScreen
    Screen shown after losing connection
    MainMenuScreen
    First screen shown
    ServerFullScreen
    Screen that is shown when the server is full
    StageScreen
    Abstract class used as base for the other screens
    WaitingForServerScreen
    Screen shown when the client is waiting for the server to start
    WinScreen
    The screen shown when the client wins
